I saw that the stewards of God can by faithful, judicious management keep their business in this world square, exact, and straight.  And it is especially the privilege and duty of the aged, the feeble, and those who have no children, to place their means where it can be used in the cause of God if they should be suddenly taken away.  But I saw that Satan and his angels exult over their success in this matter.  And those who should be wise heirs of salvation almost willingly let their Lord's money slip out of their hands 
                                                                           103
into the enemy's ranks. In this way they strengthen Satan's kingdom, and seem to feel very easy about it!  -- 1T 199,200.
